channel.title: Need for research. Please respond
channel.description:
Please fill out and reply. [code] 1. What is your age? 2. Where do you live? 3. If you were to go out to a friends, would you have to give your parents a precise time in which you would be back? 4. How long after that time would you receive a 'telling off' (aka if you were 5 mins late, 20mins late, etc). 5. Rate your organization for example, is your room messy? Do you often forget things? Are you frequently up to date with homework? etc. (rate 1-10 with reasons) 6. Do you have an older brother or sister? 7. If so, what age? 8. What time do you get up for school/work? 9. What time do you get up on the weekend? [/code]
Thanks :).

item.title: Need for research. Please respond
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Bloody hell thats early!
Thanks :).
More responses please =)

Read full topic

item.title: Need for research. Please respond
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

1.What is your age?
17

  1. Where do you live?
    UK, Preston

  2. If you were to go out to a friends, would you have to give your parents a precise time in which you would be back?
    Nope

  3. How long after that time would you receive a ‘telling off’ (aka if you were 5 mins late, 20mins late, etc).
    Usually I ring up, say I’ll be back by say 11, if I’m late doesn’t really matter unless I wake them up

  4. Rate your organization for example, is your room messy? Do you often forget things? Are you frequently up to date with homework? etc. (rate 1-10 with reasons)
    3 I suppose, I have a tidyish room, but I suck at homework, for example tonight I have to do a biology and a chemistry practical writeup for tomorrow morning, one of them is coursework and I just cannot be bothered.

  5. Do you have an older brother or sister?
    Nope, younger.

  6. If so, what age?
    He’s 14 (younger)

  7. What time do you get up for school/work?
    4am if swimming, 7:30am if no training.

  8. What time do you get up on the weekend?
    Either 5am or 10am depending again on training.

Read full topic

item.title: Need for research. Please respond
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Please fill out and reply.

1. What is your age?
2. Where do you live?
3. If you were to go out to a friends, would you have to give your parents a precise time in which you would be back?
4. How long after that time would you receive a 'telling off' (aka if you were 5 mins late, 20mins late, etc).
5. Rate your organization for example, is your room messy? Do you often forget things? Are you frequently up to date with homework? etc. (rate 1-10 with reasons)
6. Do you have an older brother or sister?
7. If so, what age?
8. What time do you get up for school/work?
9. What time do you get up on the weekend?

Thanks :).
